author: Reuters Editorial
title: Francia colloca complessivi oltre 7 mld Oat 2026, 2028, 2041 e 2048 Bond |
text: PARIGI, 1 marzo (Reuters) - The Treasury sold the following government bonds at auction on Thursday. OAT AUCTION DATE 01 MARCH 2018 MATURITY 25/05/26 COUPON 0.50 PCT SALE AMOUNT 1.954 BLN EUR BID AMOUNT 3.479 BLN EUR BID-TO-COVER 1.780 AVERAGE YIELD 0.61 PCT NON-COMPETITIVE BIDS NONE LOWEST ACCEPTED PRICE 99.02 PCT AT LOWEST PRICE* 100.00 PCT *Prices above got allotments in full PAYMENT DATE 05/03/18 LAST AUCTIONED PRIOR YIELD OAT AUCTION DATE 01 MARCH 2018 MATURITY 25/05/28 COUPON 0.75 PCT SALE AMOUNT 2.921 BLN EUR BID AMOUNT 5.421 BLN EUR BID-TO-COVER 1.856 AVERAGE YIELD 0.90 PCT NON-COMPETITIVE BIDS NONE LOWEST ACCEPTED PRICE 98.45 PCT AT LOWEST PRICE* 100.00 PCT *Prices above got allotments in full PAYMENT DATE 05/03/18 LAST AUCTIONED 01/02/18 PRIOR YIELD 0.98 PCT OAT AUCTION DATE 01 MARCH 2018 MATURITY 25/04/41 COUPON 4.50 PCT SALE AMOUNT 890 MLN EUR BID AMOUNT 2.010 BLN EUR BID-TO-COVER 2.258 AVERAGE YIELD 1.47 PCT NON-COMPETITIVE BIDS NONE LOWEST ACCEPTED PRICE 158.90 PCT AT LOWEST PRICE* 100.00 PCT *Prices above got allotments in full PAYMENT DATE 05/03/18 LAST AUCTIONED 07/09/17 PRIOR YIELD 1.49 PCT OAT AUCTION DATE 01 MARCH 2018 MATURITY 25/05/48 COUPON 2.00 PCT SALE AMOUNT 1.256 BLN EUR BID AMOUNT 2.457 BLN EUR BID-TO-COVER 1.956 AVERAGE YIELD 1.71 PCT NON-COMPETITIVE BIDS NONE LOWEST ACCEPTED PRICE 106.62 PCT AT LOWEST PRICE* 100.00 PCT *Prices above got allotments in full PAYMENT DATE 05/03/18 LAST AUCTIONED 04/01/18 PRIOR YIELD 1.75 PCT Details of the auction can be found on page
